title: Onam
summary: Onam (Malayalam: ഓണം, romanized: Ōṇaṁ, IPA: [oːɳɐm]) is an annual harvest festival celebrated in the Indian state of Kerala.[4][5] A major annual event for Keralites, it is the official festival of the state[4][6] and includes a spectrum of cultural events.[7][8] Drawing from Hindu legends,[4][9] Onam commemorates King Mahabali.[10][11]
